content: times in next single_crochet 3 single_crochet in 5ch space single_crochet in next single_crochet make ftsh starting in next double_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * to ** until you reach last-but-one 6ch space single_crochet 9 times in 6ch space bpct in cl3 one row below the next single_crochet single_crochet 9 times in last 6ch space single_crochet in last 3 single_crochet do not fasten_off top edging pb ch1 turn and start working along the top edge of the shawl single_crochet in each single_crochet and single_crochet twice in each double_crochet along the edge until reaching the center st of the shawl bpct in center st resume working single_crochet in each single_crochet and single_crochet twice in each double_crochet until the last st pb chain 1 slip_stitch in first st of row e8 fasten_off wet block to final dimensions pinning the beaded picots of the edging out to points weave in ends wear and enjoy fritillary cid 13 c 2012 aparna rolfe all rights reserved fritillary cid 13 c 2012 aparna rolfe all rights reserved fritillary cid 13 c 2012 aparna rolfe all rights reserved fritillary cid 13 c 2012 aparna rolfe all rights reserved
